oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Charter Commission member Rebecca Thomas, ca. 1962
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Charter Commission member Rebecca Thomas, circa 1962. Thomas was a law partner of Ben West and was appointed by him to both the first and second Charter Commissions. b & w; 35 mm.
